00014 HierarchyWidget::HierarchyWidget( VLNVDialer* dialer, 
00015                                                                  QWidget *parent, 
00016                                                                  LibraryInterface* handler,
00017                                                                  HierarchyModel* dataModel ):
00018 QWidget(parent), 
00019 filter_(dialer, this),
00020 view_(this, handler, &filter_),
00021 model_(dataModel) {
00022 
00023         Q_ASSERT_X(handler, "HierarchyWidget constructor",
00024                 "Null LibraryInterface pointer given as parameter");
00025         Q_ASSERT_X(dataModel, "HierarchyWidget constructor",
00026                 "Null HierarchyModel pointer given as parameter");
00027 
00028         QHBoxLayout* layout = new QHBoxLayout(this);
00029         layout->addWidget(&view_);
00030 
00031         filter_.setSourceModel(dataModel);
00032         view_.setModel(&filter_);
00033 
00034         setupConnections(dataModel);
00035 
00036         view_.sortByColumn(0, Qt::AscendingOrder);
00037 }
00038 
00039 HierarchyWidget::~HierarchyWidget() {
00040 }

00042 void HierarchyWidget::setupConnections( HierarchyModel* dataModel ) {
00043         connect(&view_, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)),
00044                 this, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00045 
00046         connect(&view_, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)),
00047                 this, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00048 
00049         // connect the view to the tree model
00050         connect(&view_, SIGNAL(openComponent(const QModelIndex&)),
00051                 dataModel, SLOT(onOpenComponent(const QModelIndex&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00052 
00053         connect(&view_, SIGNAL(openDesign(const QModelIndex&)), 
00054                 dataModel, SLOT(onOpenDesign(const QModelIndex&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00055 
00056         connect(&view_, SIGNAL(createNewComponent(const QModelIndex&)),
00057                 dataModel, SLOT(onCreateNewComponent(const QModelIndex&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00058 
00059         connect(&view_, SIGNAL(createNewDesign(const QModelIndex&)),
00060                 dataModel, SLOT(onCreateNewDesign(const QModelIndex&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00061 
00062         connect(&view_, SIGNAL(createNewBus(const QModelIndex&)),
00063                 dataModel, SLOT(onCreateNewBus(const QModelIndex&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00064 
00065         connect(&view_, SIGNAL(createNewAbsDef(const QModelIndex&)),
00066                 dataModel, SLOT(onCreateNewAbsDef(const QModelIndex&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00067 
00068         connect(&view_, SIGNAL(exportItem(const QModelIndex&)),
00069                 dataModel, SLOT(onExportItem(const QModelIndex&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00070 
00071         connect(&view_, SIGNAL(componentSelected(const VLNV&)),
00072                 this, SIGNAL(componentSelected(const VLNV&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00073 
00074         connect(&view_, SIGNAL(dragInitiated(const QModelIndex&)),
00075                 this, SLOT(prepareDrag(const QModelIndex&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00076 
00077         connect(dataModel, SIGNAL(invalidateFilter()),
00078                 &filter_, SLOT(invalidate()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00079 }

00081 void HierarchyWidget::prepareDrag( const QModelIndex& index ) {
00082         if (!index.isValid())
00083                 return;
00084 
00085         HierarchyItem* item = static_cast<HierarchyItem*>(index.internalPointer());
00086         VLNV* vlnv = item->getVLNVPointer();
00087 
00088         // if vlnv is valid
00089         if (vlnv && vlnv->isValid()) {
00090                 QDrag *drag = new QDrag(this);
00091                 QMimeData *mimeData = new QMimeData;
00092 
00093                 mimeData->setData("data/vlnvptr", QByteArray((const char*)&vlnv, sizeof(vlnv)));
00094                 drag->setMimeData(mimeData);
00095                 drag->exec();
00096         }
00097 
00098         return;
00099 }
00100 
00101 void HierarchyWidget::selectItems( const VLNV& vlnv ) {
00102         // if vlnv is not valid
00103         if (!vlnv.isValid()) {
00104 
00105                 // do not select anything
00106                 view_.clearSelection();
00107         }
00108 
00109         QModelIndexList modelIndexes = model_->findIndexes(vlnv);
00110 
00111         // convert the model indexes to view indexes
00112         QModelIndexList viewIndexes;
00113         foreach (QModelIndex index, modelIndexes) {
00114                 if (index.isValid())
00115                         viewIndexes.append(filter_.mapFromSource(index));
00116         }
00117 
00118         view_.setSelectedIndexes(viewIndexes);
00119 }
